text:
Who knew Pete Davidson was a desperate romantic in the heart?

In a preview of Wednesday The Tonight Show starring Jimmy Fallon the new fiance Saturday Night Live screams his love for Ariana Grande from the metaphorical mountain tops. Sitting next to Robert Pattinson Davidson confirms for the first time publicly that he has actually proposed to the popstar.

"I feel like I've won a competition," Pete, 24, tells Jimmy Fallon . "He's so sick, he's bright, Jimmy."

It is not surprising that an eyewitness tells E! News that Ariana was watching the interview on the side of the stage. "He had a huge smile on his face all the time and continued to clap," the source reveals.
title: Watch Pete Davidson Blush as He Discusses Engagement to Ariana Grande on The Tonight Show
